title: An apologie for Paris for rejecting of Juno and Pallas, and presenting of Ate's golden ball to Venus with a discussion of the reasons that might induce him to favour either of the three : occasioned by a private discourse, wherein the Trojans judgment was carped at by some and defended / by R.B., Gent.
author: Baron, Robert, b. 1630.
publisher: Printed for Th. Dring, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
